name: Katarina's Farm
storyline: I was reincarnated as a villainess, Katarina, of an otome game I have played in the past. My future as a villainess only leads to exile or death? Impossible?! In order to avoid the doom flags, I must talk to the soil and increase my magical powers! Talk to the soil... means making a field!
summary: A mini farming simulator game of "My Next Life as a Villainess! All Routes Lead to Doom!". Let's make our own Katarina farm with cute pixel characters!

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: HameFura - My Next Life As A Villainess - "Katarina's Farm" Game Demo [Collecting Keith + Mary]
